oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Isabel Harper interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harper, Isabel
Berghel, Susan Eckelmann
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Oral history interview documenting the efforts of Chattanooga Students Leading Change, a grassroots organization involved in the March For Our Lives movement to advocate for legal and policy changes at local and state levels. The March for Our Lives movement is organized by the students of Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida, who led a historic march for gun control in Washington D.C. on 2018 March 24.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Gun control -- United States; Protest movements -- United States
Harper, Isabel
Chattanooga Students Leading Change (Organization); March for Our Lives (2018 : Washington, D.C.)
